description: Price is reasonable but quality feels premium.

examples.translation: Affordable but not cheap, buy it blind

examples.chinese: 平价不廉价,绝对物超所值
examples.translation: Affordable but not cheap, absolutely great value

examples.chinese: 不愧是价格便宜,效果好!平价不廉价
examples.translation: Cheap price indeed, good effect! Affordable but not cheap looking
